facts.fact: Spain's Digital Nomad Visa requires a minimum monthly income of €2,520 (€30,240 annually)
Applicants must work remotely for companies registered outside Spain, or earn 80% or more of their income from non-Spanish clients
Initial Digital Nomad Visa is valid for 3 years and can be renewed for an additional 2 years, totaling 5 years maximum
Processing time for Digital Nomad Visa applications is 20 working days from submission
facts.source: Spanish Ministry of Inclusion, Social Security and Migration

facts.fact: Family members (spouse, children under 18, dependent parents) can be included in the Digital Nomad Visa application
Digital Nomad Visa holders may qualify for Beckham Law tax benefits (24% flat rate on Spanish-source income up to €600,000)
facts.source: Spanish Tax Agency - Special Tax Regime
